metadata.symbol: Where Pop Art and Fine Art meet the Blockchain
metadata.description:
The Infinity Gauntlet 

You get the NFT and the one of one 60x48 in. physical painting signed by Stan Lee - mailed to your door. 

For more than 60 years, Stan Lee’s creations have driven pop culture and content. In this cover, Stan is Thanos, wearing the Infinity Gauntlet, ready to control the universe itself. (60x48 Gouache and mixed on aquavilla, Infinity Gauntlet #1 Comic cover parody, original cover by George Perez). Signed by Stan Lee.
metadata.title: The Infinity Gauntlet
metadata.subtitle: Stan Lee wields control of the Universe as Thanos with his Infinity Gauntlet
metadata.name: The Infinity Gauntlet
